title: changed mechanism for automatically clocking in and out by location/wifi: now…
message:
changed mechanism for automatically clocking in and out by location/wifi: now every tracking method registers itself on activation (and unregisters at deactivation) - real events are only generated when the first tracking method clocks in (clock-in event) or when the last tracking method clocks out (clock-out event)

- WifiTracker: fix "stop tracking" on foreign wifi
